summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL REGARDING THE FUEL PUMP ON NOVEMBER 23,2002.  THE CONSUMER MADE AN APPOINTMENT WITH THE DEALER.  THE FIRST TIME THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN FOR REPAIRS THE DEALER INDICATED THAT NOT PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.  FOR THE LAST THREE MONTHS THE PART HAS NOT BEEN AVAILABLE.  THE DEALER ALSO STATED THE THEY DIDN'T HAVE TIME TO FIX THE MOTORCYCLE.  (MANGER NAME IS [XXX]).   *NLM  THE PART FOR THE RECALL HAS BEEN MADE AVAILABLE AS OF 01/31/03.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY'LL CALL WHEN THE PART HAS ARRIVED.  THE DEALER HASN'T MADE THE REPAIRS TO THE VEHICLE.  RECALL#02V263000  SCC    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
